rules_text:
Pact [i](At the beginning of your end step, put a pact counter on a creature you control if you haven't this turn, then sacrifice it if it has two or more.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control with a pact counter on it dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
notes:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/B1NaLz

Undue's presence caused a divide among the liches of Hwel, driving many to entreat greater entities for protection.
